'''Lightning Stiletto''' is a [[Talent Card|Talent]] [[Combat Action Card|Combat Action]] [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]]. This card can only be created through [[Stellar Restoration (Character Card Skill)|Stellar Restoration]] and cannot be included in the deck otherwise.

==Gameplay Notes==
* This card can be returned to the Draw Pile by the effect of [[Nature and Wisdom]]. If returned this way, another copy of this card can be created in the Hand.
* If multiple copies of this card are in the Hand when Stellar Restoration is used, all copies of the card in the Hand are discarded, and Keqing gains 1 Electro Infusion. Copies of this card in the Draw Pile are unaffected.
